---
title: Privacy notice
---

BigPicture Sweden is hosted by [National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS)](https://nbis.se) and is consequently subject to that organisation's [Privacy Policy](https://nbis.se/about/steering/privacy). Since NBIS is legally part of [Uppsala University](http://uu.se/en), you will also find information about the processing of personal data in the university's [Data Protection Policy](https://www.uu.se/en/about-uu/data-protection-policy/).
